labels.name: story
labels.value: HIJRA-236[Android-FE] e-KTP KYC Page - As a user, I want to be able to do an NPWP for KYC purposes, so that the registration process could be done faster.

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Register Data, Upload Document, Selfie Ekyc, Signature, Review Data, Personal Info
